title: In case of educational use, 15% area may be used for commercial purpose subject to provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: In case of educational use, 15% area may be used for commercial purpose subject to provisions of Regulation No.4.10(vi).

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
